mapper.select: select distinct bm.*, isell.*, ip.ip_value from bookmark as bm join item as item on b_user_no = #{uNo} and b_item_no = item.i_no and item.i_type = 'sell' left join item_sell as isell on item.i_type = 'sell' and b_item_no = isell.is_item_no left join (select ANY_VALUE(ip_no) as ip_no, ip_item_no, ANY_VALUE(ip_value) as ip_value from item_photo group by ip_item_no) as ip on ip.ip_no = bm.b_item_no;

select distinct bm.*, ibuy.*, ip.ip_value from bookmark as bm join item as item on b_user_no = #{uNo} and b_item_no = item.i_no and item.i_type = 'buy' left join item_buy as ibuy on item.i_type = 'buy' and b_item_no = ibuy.ib_item_no left join (select ANY_VALUE(ip_no) as ip_no, ip_item_no, ANY_VALUE(ip_value) as ip_value from item_photo group by ip_item_no) as ip on ip.ip_no = bm.b_item_no;
select * from bookmark where b_item_no = #{bItemNo} and b_user_no = #{bUserNo};
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where b_item_no = #{bItemNo} and b_user_no = #{bUserNo};
